title: Beginner Gardening Secrets You Need To Know - Q & A
itunes:title: Beginner Gardening Secrets You Need To Know - Q & A
description: Today I’m answering YOUR questions! I took a poll on Instagram asking what you wanted to know about gardening - any question on any gardening topic. The results were so many! In today’s podcast, I’m answering as many questions as possible, to the best of my ability based on my own experiences and knowledge. For a full list of the questions and answers, shownotes and any links mentioned, visit melissaknorris.com/300.
